Articles.Content: I like those Suits hanging in the back xD

Just want to remind all of you guys, this update WILL BREAK your saves!! So make sure to start over!

Wooo! Update!

waitwaitwaitwait... it's a save-breaker? Then I think I'll hold off on installing for a bit.
Thank you for the update! Your efforts are much appreciated.
Is anyone else getting crashing of the game when returning to Kerbin Atmosphere?

Just want to remind all of you guys, this update WILL BREAK your saves!! So make sure to start over!

Just be clear, you're saying all the work one has done, such as extensively scouting and roving over Eeloo, will break if I update the installed American Pack mod?

Just be clear, you're saying all the work one has done, such as extensively scouting and roving over Eeloo, will break if I update the installed American Pack mod?

Consider all that practice for your next round of missions.

Is anyone else getting crashing of the game when returning to Kerbin Atmosphere?

Post log here

Not crashing but crew disappearing from stock pods at 14000 km, replaced new version with old version of american and soviet pack problem gone and yes i deleted all the old packs completely and started a new save

Not crashing but crew disappearing from stock pods at 14000 km, replaced new version with old version of american and soviet pack problem gone and yes i deleted all the old packs completely and started a new save

That is correct - stock pods don't (yet) have Oxygen and therefore crew suffocates...
the regenerator doesn't seem to be doing anything for me what should the time be for the lok?
Damn i didnt realise it was working on all pods, I thought it was only the bobcat stuff
Are you going to incorporate the ECLSS in the ISS pack or will it be separate ?

Just be clear, you're saying all the work one has done, such as extensively scouting and roving over Eeloo, will break if I update the installed American Pack mod?

Get used to it...your playing a game still in alpha. Some times mods update, or ksp updates, and you have to start everything all over. Dont get to attached to any save game or craft....

ALSO..is anyone working on MM file to add this to stock pods?...me and MM dont play nice =P....least not the file part

Edited November 13, 2013 by KhaosCorp
Sorry if this is a stupid question but what is ECLSS?

Sorry if this is a stupid question but what is ECLSS?

i think it is ioncross crew support

i think it is ioncross crew support

Google is your friend for searching. Environment Control Life Support System. Basically a fancier way of saying Life Support.

Sorry if this is a stupid question but what is ECLSS?

Environment Control and Life Support System
what is KSPSP?

what is KSPSP?

Kerbal Space Program SpacePort

Ok, guys, like it usually happens, I've found a serious bug that could hang KSP. You can get a hotfix here: https://bitbucket.org/asmi/ksp/downloads/LifeSupportMod.1.0.1.zip To install, unpack it inside GameData folder.

BobCat - please update the version in your pack.
Thank you, I just came back to post about this.
